bug.author: srikris
bug.summary: Annotations should error out on empty Frame
bug.description:
Right now, I get back a new SFrame without an annotation column <denchmark-code>In [16]: aa = tc.image_classifier.annotate(sf[0:0])
In [17]: aa Out[17]: Columns: path str image Image
Rows: 0
Data: [] </denchmark-code>

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/znation>@znation</denchmark-link> Please assign this ticket to me as I would like to try fixing it and contribute .Thanks in advance!
